DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study compare efficacy safety aspirin , acetaminophen caffeine ( AAC ) sumatriptan placebo acute treatment migraine .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Acetaminophen , Aspirin Caffeine With Sumatriptan Acute Treatment Migraine
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Male female age 18 year . 2. International Headache Society ( IHS ) diagnosis migraine without aura typical aura migraine headache . 3 . History experience least 1 , 8 , acute migraine attack monthly previous year . 4 . History least moderate migraine pain intensity , leave untreated . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Headache symptom may due aggravate : Recent ( within 6 month ) head neck trauma ( e.g. , whiplash ) Head neck pain secondary orthopedic abnormality Cluster headache Specific migraine variant ( e.g. , basilartype artery migraine , ophthalmoplegic migraine , hemiplegic migraine , migraine aura without headache ) Other serious , nonmigraine cause headache ( e.g. , increased intracranial pressure , intracranial bleeding , meningitis , malignancy ) Nonserious , nonmigraine cause headache ( e.g. , cold , flu , hangover ) 2 . Routine use ( â‰¥ 10 day per month , average ) medication potential interfere pharmacologic effect evaluation study medication ( e.g. , narcotic nonnarcotic analgesic product ( prescription overthecounter ) , ergotaminecontaining ergottype medication , anxiolytic , hypnotic , sedative , 5HT1 agonist , antiemetic , prokinetic drug ) . 3 . History vomit 20 % migraine episode confine bedrest 50 % migraine episode . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
